{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#生田辉# 你从骨子里透出真正的帅气，这不只是你日渐变得英气的外表，更是你待人的温柔与礼貌，还有时不时对女孩子们释放的致命吸引力。\n你时常会因为自己唱歌的经验尚浅而过度练习，也会无意识表露出你的紧张。但请无需慌张，无论是画画，还是你对动漫的熟悉，或者是你的帅气，都是你在九人中独有的优点，你已在众多人心中留下一抹紫色，而这些一定会在岁月更替中更加凝练，放射出属于你自己的强烈光芒。\n生田辉生日快乐🎂🎂❤❤","id":21073912,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":480,"img_size":21.9892578125,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/64e6dc9fe52bbccd3ee38d48a2002593047dcfe4.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":720},{"img_height":260,"img_size":2246.91796875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/57500991d6dc1354d40286577f2eda021266a009.gif","img_tags":null,"img_width":260},{"img_height":978,"img_size":92.5078125,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/85bd28e5b61c73a4c6616c149044639ce9e2f9f9.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":676},{"img_height":720,"img_size":33.4052734375,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/43c5d9ac6904c7bb38e606298fa080a24d1abdd6.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":720},{"img_height":539,"img_size":39.9091796875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/e34afec7c94ee068c2ba2d2b33a261d78e92cd0a.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":720},{"img_height":382,"img_size":28.98046875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/725045f1990de36596c40060b2fa1c4729187255.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":574},{"img_height":498,"img_size":33.15625,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/6a0c312f5243950da3d0a6691c2b518134279b36.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":720},{"img_height":498,"img_size":34.7333984375,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/767ae90273b4747d8a0663cfa9259c5debd495bf.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":720},{"img_height":498,"img_size":36.2138671875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/cd849dc816b408a164c02f63ffa7206adb62e7ea.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":720}],"pictures_count":9,"reply":114,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1556552419},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8
